exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

original: intros xs H. induction H. - exists 0. constructor. - destruct IHForall as [n IH]. destruct H0 as [m Hm]. exists (S (max n m)). constructor. unfold LindenbaumChain in *. intros a Hin. apply or_assoc. right. split. + apply Lindenbaum_included_n_m with (m:=max n m). apply Max.le_max_l. apply Hm. + apply H. apply Union_introl. apply IH. apply Hin.
